transcript:
Customer: Mere prakar subah mein teri sehre
Hello
Executive: Ji namaskar ji Ajay Rohila ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ji Rohila sahab Ankur Singh baat kar raha hun India Mart se abhi aapka call aaya tha sir.
Customer: Achcha ji nahi mere jo manager hai wo to koi aur baat karte aapki to nahi nahi main Ankur Singh baat kar raha hun sir mere paas hi aapka catalog hai aur main hi take care kar raha hun last time bhi meri aapse baat hui thi sir.
Customer: Nahi
Executive: Sir aur kisi ka call aata hai shubham naam ke kisi bande ka.
Customer: Nahi nahi shubham ka nahi sir Ankur Singh ka hi aata hai aur aap ek baar agar apna whatsapp bhi check karoge na to mera hi whatsapp aata hai aapke paas mein.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Haan ji ha ji bataiye sir India Mart ka lena hai refer karta hun to kya milega.
Executive: Sir usme hai na dekho isme kya hai isme koi hum koi extra aisa extra kuch reference nahi share karte hain sir kuch dete hain is tarike se.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan ji ha ji.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan to ye cheeze aur koi jankari sir iske alava?
Customer: Nahi main usko to koi kisi ko motivate kara tha maine kaha kuch milega to wo aage process karwata.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aapko bhi.
Customer: Nahi aapki baat bilkul theek hai wo to as a goodwill gesture aap jaise main aapke account manager aap mujhe share kar sakte hain main baat kar lunga.
Executive: Theek hai na baki sir dekho company ki taraf se main kuch cheeze aisi wo hi bataunga jo cheeze ho sakti hai ek to company ki taraf se kuch aisa nahi milta hai sir baki jaise aap aapke aur mere acche terms hai to main aap us bihaf pe agar mujhe share kare to certainly main aapki aur help kar sakta hun usme no doubt koi dikkat nahi hai wo to main regular aapke touch me rahunga rahunga ha ji ha ji as a gentleman aap usme kar sakte hain.
Customer: Nahi pehle jo main wo to kara dete the.
Executive: Nahi sir aisa kuch nahi hai kyuki maine jaise abhi manager se pucha unhi ke paas ye case gaya hua tha to isliye maine pucha hai sir aapko.
Customer: Achcha theek hai.
Executive: Haan ji ha ji iske alava koi aur concern issue ho to bataiye sir.
Customer: Nahi sir.
Executive: Hai na bas to ye confirmation ke liye aapne phone kiya tha sir to kyuki isme hai na abhi mere paas ek ticket aaya tha main apne end se close kar raha hun mere liye feedback aayega wo share kijiyega sir aap theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan aur baki jo lead vagarah kaisi aa rahi hai sir lead inquiry calls vagarah?
Customer: Sahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai na to inko aap follow kijiye koi bhi concern issue ho directly aap mujhe phone ya whatsapp kar sakte hain mera number aapke paas mein hai right sir.
Customer: Theek theek theek.
Executive: Theek theek hai ji thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquired about referral benefits.



Resolution:

- Explained no referral benefits from company.

- Executive offered help on personal terms.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to share feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- referral, benefits, buyleads, feedback
